title: Contract - Perm Dental Clinic Assistant (Islandwide, Up to $3000) #HCGJ
company_info: Established since 1996, Recruit Express has emerged as the leading staffing solutions provider that has set a proven track record for matching the right people to the right organization within the shortest time. In our relentless pursuit of excellent service, we have adopted best practices and dynamic growth strategies in expanding our operations across the Asia Pacific regions: We have offices in Singapore, Sydney, Hong Kong, Kuala Lumpur, Taipei, Shanghai, Beijing, Tokyo and Bangkok. description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for Contract Dental Clinic assistants to be outsourced to our clients.

Job Description:
Preparing patients for dental work.
Helping with infection control by sterilizing and disinfecting instruments, setting up instrument trays, preparing materials, and assisting with dental procedures.
Assisting dentists in managing medical and dental emergencies when necessary.
Assisting dental hygienists with procedures when necessary.
Providing great patient care.
Recording treatment information in patient records.
Exposing dental x-rays from dental diagnostics and caring for dental x-ray equipment.
Giving patients information on dental hygiene, oral health care, and plaque control programs.
Collecting and recording medical and dental histories and patient vital signs.
Providing postoperative instructions as directed by the dentist.
Caring for dental equipment.
Requirements:
Min N/O/A Lvl
Able to commit to the working hrs
Proficient in MS Office/Excel/Word

All qualified applicants, please send in your resume to:
triciagoh@recruitexpress.com.sg

Tricia Celestine Goh (R1981653)
Recruit Express Pte Ltd | Company Reg. No. 199601303W | EA License Number: 99C4599

title: Dental Assistant
company_info: Bethesda Medical Centre is a multi-doctor comprehensive Medical Clinic and Health Screening Centre in Suntec City, with better equipped facilities to provide comprehensive care in a convenient location. We have provisions to handle laboratory services, diagnostic s-rays, ultrasounds, mammogram, hearing & eye assessment, lung function & cardiac evaluation, bone sonometry assessment, sleep polysomnography studies, physiotherapy, nurse practitioner and diet counselling services. In addition we house a large pharmacy with a wide range of medicine and have been providing primary care and occupational health services in the community. Bethesda also manages a Ministry of Manpower Regional Medical Centre @ 47 Gul Circle, testings and medical examinations at Migrant Worker Onboarding Centres (MWOC @ Sengkang, MWOC @ CCK, MWOC @ Tengah), HQuick Test Centre at Suntec City, various offsites tesing facilities at SHN hotels.
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Dental Assistant for Margaret Drive outlet
Job Description & Requirements
Dental Assistant Responsibilities:
Preparing patients for dental work.
Helping with infection control by sterilizing and disinfecting instruments, setting up instrument trays, preparing materials, and assisting with dental procedures.
Assisting dentists in managing medical and dental emergencies when necessary.
Assisting dental hygienists with procedures when necessary.
Providing great patient care.
Recording treatment information in patient records.
Exposing dental x-rays from dental diagnostics and caring for dental x-ray equipment.
Giving patients information on dental hygiene, oral health care, and plaque control programs.
Collecting and recording medical and dental histories and patient vital signs.
Providing postoperative instructions as directed by the dentist.
Caring for dental equipment.
Forming preliminary impressions for study casts and occlusal registrations for mounting study casts.
Ordering dental supplies and maintaining dental equipment inventory.
Requirements:
Certification/ Diploma in an accredited dental assisting program.
Certifcation in Healthcare Support (Sterilisation Services)
Dental x-ray certification.
Completion of Dental Hygiene Program.
Experience using computers for a variety of tasks.
Good written and verbal communication skills.
Able to provide great patient care.

- Work location : 38 Margaret Drive Singapore 141038
- Enjoy Employee benefits
- Annual Leaves
- Work Life Harmony

description:
Roles & Responsibilities
We are looking for Dental Assistant to work in reputable healthcare organisations!

Job Scope:
· Preparing patients for dental work.
· Helping with infection control by sterilizing and disinfecting instruments, setting up instrument trays, preparing materials, and assisting with dental procedures.
· Assisting dentists in managing medical and dental emergencies when necessary.
· Assisting dental hygienists with procedures when necessary.
· Providing great patient care.
· Recording treatment information in patient records.
· Exposing dental x-rays from dental diagnostics and caring for dental x-ray equipment.
· Giving patients information on dental hygiene, oral health care, and plaque control programs.
· Collecting and recording medical and dental histories and patient vital signs.
· Providing postoperative instructions as directed by the dentist.
· Caring for dental equipment.
· Forming preliminary impressions for study casts and occlusal registrations for mounting study casts.
· Ordering dental supplies and maintaining dental equipment inventory.
· Fabricating temporary restorations and custom impressions from preliminary impressions.

Requirements:
Minimum GCE 'A' Levels/ Diploma
Proficient in MS Office
Able to commit for minimum 3 months
No dental assistant experience needed
Training given

Apply now by sending your resume to: rehealth@recruitexpress.com.sg
or call Tammy Yap at 8178 6641for more enquiries.

We regret to inform you that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Tammy Yap | Outsourcing Team | EA License Number: 99C4599
